MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA9 postcode area of St Helens. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:36 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:32PM on 19th March 2021.
